Title: Mother
Country: South Korea
USA release: 12/03/2010
Premiere in Spain
DVD release (sale): 01/03/2011
Company: CJ Entertainment
Director: Bong Joon-ho
Screenwriter: Park Eun-kyo, Bong Joon-ho & Wun-kyo Park
Starring: Won Bin, Ku Jin, Kim Hye-ja.


Synopsis:
Long widow, a mother living alone with her 28 year old son, a young shy and quiet. This woman must protect her son about allegations that places him prime suspect in a horrible crime but there is no clear evidence about the authorship of it. At the incompetence and corruption in both the police and legal system, deciding finally arrested and jailed, she alone must fight and gather evidence to prove the innocence of his son.
